statements: SELECT * FROM reservation;
SELECT reservation_id, reservation_date, vehicle_type FROM reservation;
SELECT reservation_id, customer_preferences FROM reservation WHERE reservation_date = '2023-01-15';
SELECT reservation_id, customer_preferences FROM reservation WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV';
SELECT * FROM reservation ORDER BY reservation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM reservation ORDER BY reservation_date DESC, reservation_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT reservation_id, reservation_date FROM reservation WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV' AND reservation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY reservation_date ASC
SELECT reservation_id, vehicle_type FROM reservation WHERE CAST(reservation_date AS DATE) = '2022-03-15'
SELECT * FROM reservation WHERE customer_preferences ILIKE '%pet-friendly%'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reservations, vehicle_type FROM reservation GROUP BY vehicle_type HAVING COUNT(*) >= 3 ORDER BY total_reservations DESC
SELECT * FROM reservation;
SELECT reservation_id, customer_preferences FROM reservation;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer;
SELECT reservation_date, vehicle_type, customer_preferences FROM reservation WHERE reservation_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer WHERE customer_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';

SELECT reservation_date, vehicle_type, customer_name FROM reservation r JOIN customer c ON r.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE reservation_date >= '2021-01-01' AND reservation_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY reservation_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reservations, customer_name FROM reservation r JOIN customer c ON r.customer_id = c.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_reservations > 2;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS reservation_count FROM reservation r JOIN customer c ON r.customer_id = c.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY reservation_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM reservation;
SELECT vehicle_name, vehicle_model, registration_number FROM vehicle ORDER BY vehicle_name DESC;
SELECT reservation_id, reservation_date, vehicle_type FROM reservation WHERE reservation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT reservation_id, customer_name, vehicle_name FROM reservation r JOIN customer c ON r.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN vehicle v ON r.vehicle_type = v.vehicle_name;
SELECT * FROM reservation WHERE reservation_date='2022-10-15';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer WHERE customer_phone='123-456-7890';
SELECT * FROM vehicle WHERE vehicle_model='SUV' ORDER BY vehicle_name ASC;

SELECT reservation.reservation_id, customer.customer_name, vehicle.vehicle_name FROM reservation JOIN customer ON reservation.reservation_id = customer.customer_id JOIN vehicle ON reservation.vehicle_id = vehicle.vehicle_id WHERE reservation_date>'2022-10-01';

SELECT customer_name, reservation_date, vehicle_name FROM reservation JOIN customer ON reservation.customer_id = customer.customer_id JOIN vehicle ON reservation.vehicle_id = vehicle.vehicle_id WHERE vehicle_type='Sedan' AND customer_preferences LIKE '%window%' ORDER BY reservation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM reservation ORDER BY reservation_date DESC;
SELECT reservation_id, vehicle_type FROM reservation WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV';
SELECT * FROM reservation WHERE reservation_date >= '2021-07-01' AND reservation_date <= '2021-08-01';
SELECT reservation_id, customer_preferences->'location' AS location FROM reservation WHERE customer_preferences @> '{"location":"beach"}';
SELECT reservation_id, reservation_date, customer_preferences FROM reservation ORDER BY reservation_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM reservation WHERE reservation_date = '2022-08-15'
SELECT reservation_id, vehicle_type FROM reservation WHERE reservation_date > '2022-08-15' ORDER BY reservation_date DESC
SELECT reservation_id, vehicle_type, customer_preferences FROM reservation WHERE vehicle_type IN ('SUV', 'Sedan') LIMIT 5
SELECT reservation_id, vehicle_type FROM reservation WHERE customer_preferences->>'price_range' = 'affordable' ORDER BY reservation_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reservations, AVG(EXTRACT(day FROM AGE(NOW(), reservation_date))) AS average_days FROM reservation WHERE reservation_date < '2022-08-15'
SELECT * FROM reservation WHERE reservation_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, reservation_date FROM reservation WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV' ORDER BY reservation_date DESC;
SELECT reservation_id, customer_id, vehicle_type FROM reservation WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY reservation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM reservation WHERE reservation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT customer_id, preferences FROM reservation WHERE vehicle_type = 'SEDAN' AND preferences LIKE '%non-smoking%';
SELECT * FROM reservation WHERE reservation_id = 101;
SELECT reservation_id, reservation_date FROM reservation WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV' AND reservation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT MAX(reservation_date) AS latest_reservation_date, COUNT(*) AS total_reservations FROM reservation WHERE customer_id = 201 GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT vehicle_type, COUNT(*) AS total_reservations FROM reservation GROUP BY vehicle_type ORDER BY total_reservations DESC;
SELECT * FROM reservation WHERE preferences LIKE '%window%' OR preferences LIKE '%aisle%' ORDER BY reservation_date DESC;
